thread.title: In The Most Patriotic Revelation Of All Times, India’s Most Searched Porn Term Is “Indian”
thread.title_full: In The Most Patriotic Revelation Of All Times, India’s Most Searched Porn Term Is “Indian”

title: In The Most Patriotic Revelation Of All Times, India’s Most Searched Porn Term Is “Indian”
text:
facebook 342 SHARES 
Drumroll… India is the fourth biggest consumer of porn in the world. No surprises there. For a country whose education system has sincerely whitened out the word “sex” in textbooks, this is quite a peek into our thirsty sheets. Sorry, censor board, all those hours spent beeping out salacious words on TV don’t quite reflect on our sexual habits. India is a horny nation, according to PornHub’s year-in-review report. 
Since we are such a Prem-Ratan-Dhan-Paayo -loving bunch of hypocrites, there is a sanskaari twist to this declaration. As for the most searched terms on the website, we’ve outclassed every ranking nation. Our one-of-a-kind top searches (mostly inspired by regressive Bollywood movies) are – 1. Indian Because horny dil hai Hindustani … 2. Indian wife Who isn’t thirsty for a sanskaari Indian naari? 3. Indian college Ya’ll know, education is spelled as S-E-X. 4. Indian bhabhi
